properties.property: WELCOME TO FORGOTTEN ISLAND! THIS ISLAND IS A WORLD HERITAGE SITE!
欢迎来到被遗忘之岛！ 这个岛被评定为世界遗产！

property.name: description
property.value: Cannot be used until the Flying Ace above them is spoken to. Interacting with them after the Flying Ace moves out of the way shows a gray, monochrome patch of grass.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 直到与它上面的Flying Ace说过话之后才能用。在Flying Ace挪开后与它互动会显示一个灰色背景，上面有几棵白色的草。

property.name: description
property.value: Comments on the height discrepancy between themselves and [[Kris]] and asks if they have been working out. If conversed with again, they tell Kris to stop growing up.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 表示Kris看起来很高大，并且问Kris最近是不是锻炼身体了。再次互动Ta会让Kris别长大了。

property.name: description
property.value: Expresses surprise at seeing [[Kris]] and asks if they have arrived to play with them. If interacted with again, the Flying Ace laments that Kris "never wants to play" and asks them to make a photocopy of Kris to play with.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 看见[[Kris]]时表示很惊讶，问Kris是不是来和Ta们玩的。再次互动Ta会说，Kris根本不想陪Ta玩，并问Kris要不要复印一个Kris陪他们一起玩。

property.name: description
property.value: A unique pink Ace who divulges on the nature of copies, stating that they are monochrome, but each one of them was carefully colored in by [[Kris]]. Interacting again causes them to mention how the pink Ace was probably suspicious.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 一张粉色的A，Ta道出了复印牌的由来。原来Ta们复印出来都是黑白的，但[[Kris]]为Ta们每个人都认真地上了色。再次互动Ta会说那张粉红的A有点可疑。

property.name: description
property.value: Is using the binoculars when [[Kris]] first visits the area, but gives them up after declaring that it "doesn't look too good." Interacting again leads to them calling it "lousy real estate" and that they sense nothing but evil from wherever the binoculars are pointing.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: [[Kris]]刚来时，Ta正在用望远镜，但Ta发现“情况看起来不太妙”之后就放弃了。再次互动Ta会说那是“让人不适的豪宅”，并且感觉到望远镜所指的那地方有一股邪气！

property.name: description
property.value: Mentions that [[Man|someone]] was looking for [[Kris]], but they cannot remember who. Further dialogue prompts them to suggest checking behind the tree.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 提到刚才[[被遗忘的男人|有人]]找[[Kris]]，但不记得是谁了。再次互动Ta会建议看看树后。

property.name: description
property.value: Introduces themselves and the other 5 [[Rudinn]]s as the Seven Flying Aces, a group of Aces [[Kris]] made copies of to (unsuccessfully) cheat at cards, before getting lost in the couch and ending up in Mancountry. Interacting with them again has them lampshade the fact that there are only 6 Aces present, telling Kris that they would not have needed to cheat if they could count cards better.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 介绍Ta自己与其余5个[[Rudinn]]说Ta们是【王牌战队7人组】，是Kris为了出老千（未遂）复印的7张A。后来Ta们掉进了沙发缝里，然后就到了男人国。再次与Ta们互动，Ta们会说事实上只有6张A，如果Kris能数得清牌的话，就没必要出老千了。

property.name: description
property.value: Interacting behind the tree initiates a dialogue with the [[Man]], who speaks cryptically both about himself and their current location. He mentions being forgotten, and if at any point the [[player]] implies that they will not remember him, he ends their conversation prematurely. Otherwise, he gifts [[Kris]] an Egg while changing them into their [[Dark World]] attire. Regardless of how their dialogue ends, the Man disappears afterwards and cannot be interacted with again.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 在树后互动将会开启与[[被遗忘的男人|男人]]的一段对话。男人会神秘地与你谈论他自己以及当前所在的地点。他提到被遗忘，如果[[玩家]]选择会遗忘他（“是”），他会提前结束对话。如果选择不会遗忘（“否”），他会送给Kris一个蛋，同时Kris变成了[[暗世界]]的外观。无论对话如何结束，男人随后都会消失并且无法再次与他互动。

property.name: description
property.value: Heading east at any point, regardless of if the [[Egg]] has been obtained or not, will fade the screen to white, and return [[Kris]] to the Green Room.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 无论是否拿到[[蛋]]，任何时候向东走，屏幕都会淡出到白屏，并把[[Kris]]送回休息室。
